title: A handcrafted dream catcher
short: Handcrafted dream catcher to bring positivity and peaceful dreams to your space.
description: A beautifully handcrafted dream catcher made with delicate threads. Inspired by traditional designs, it’s perfect for adding a touch of boho charm while filtering out negative energy.

title: Lippan art decoratives
short: Handcrafted Lippan art wall décor made with mirrors and clay for a traditional charm.
description: A stunning piece of handcrafted Lippan art created by skilled artisans using clay and mirrors. Each artwork reflects the rich heritage of Kutch, bringing warmth, texture, and tradition to your home.

title: Handcrafted Torans
short: Handcrafted decorative toran for elegant festive home décor.
description: Beautifully handcrafted torans designed by local artisans, featuring colorful beads and threads that add a festive touch and welcoming charm to your home entrance.
